## GreaterThan class

Filters is a key component when communicating with a backend. The GreaterThan filter resembles the &gt; and &gt;<!-- -->= operator in SQL.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class GreaterThan implements Filter 
```
**Implements:** [Filter](./forms42core.filter.md)
